article_title: Gad! In GOP Debate Three Big Issues Virtually Ignored

article_metadata.description: THE FIRST GOP DEBATE (both early and evening sessions) showcased an impressive slate of experienced, accomplished leaders. But, unfortunately, all that potential firepower didn't translate into straightforward talk detailing how the individual candidates would rally our floundering economy, the single most important issue in this election. The pundits can argue about [...]
article_metadata.author: Steve Forbes
